mapper.sql: a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.real_agio AS "realAgio", a.gender_id AS "genderId", a.season_id AS "seasonId", a.goods_type_id AS "goodsTypeId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.modify_time AS "modifyTime", a.state AS "state", a.proxy_self_agio AS "proxySelfAgio"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_cfg_channel_agio( channel_id, brand_id, real_agio, gender_id, season_id, goods_type_id, create_time, modify_time, state, proxy_self_agio ) VALUES ( #{channelId}, #{brandId}, #{realAgio}, #{genderId}, #{seasonId}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{state}, #{proxySelfAgio} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_cfg_channel_agio SET channel_id = #{channelId}, brand_id = #{brandId}, real_agio = #{realAgio}, gender_id = #{genderId}, season_id = #{seasonId}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId}, create_time = #{createTime}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, state = #{state}, proxy_self_agio = #{proxySelfAgio} WHERE id = #{id}
